posts.title: Forcing others to use your “pronouns” is sexual harassment
posts.content:
Troons who try to dictate others language to suit their sexual fantasy should be treated as sexual harassment. You are NOT a woman, and never will be. You don’t get to force me to be involved in your deluded sick fantasy

If we lived In a sane world, troons would be the ones getting fired for making others use pronouns instead of normal people refusing to play make-believe.

twitter.content: Last year Gov. Newsom vetoed a bill that would have let CalFire retain seasonal firefighters to help with staffing shortages. His veto forced the layoff of thousands of seasonal firefighters, who he never replaced despite his promises. This is negligence of the highest order.

posts.title: Society today doesn't seem to be able to distinguish between gendered vices and gender behavior.
posts.content:
Men and women are more prone to different vices. Men have more of a tendency to struggle with anger and aggression while women tend to be prone towards a deflection of responsibility and an obscene need for novelty and chaotic drama.

And I am very concerned about this societal trend lately which unfortunately is manifesting itself in a much more severe way on the right and in the political center then it is on the left... And this trend is basically one of advocating that each gender should simply embrace their genders' vices as a necessary and good trait of their gender.

What's perhaps even worse is that people have started revising history and pretending like violence and aggression in men or women's tendency to deflect responsibility and need for drama was celebrated in the historical past...

The truth is, in Western civilization, we have never embraced these behaviors. Western civilization did not become one of the best civilizations in history from advocating that people embrace their primal vices. We became one of the best civilizations from precisely the opposite, we taught people how to control their vices, perhaps even redirect them towards something positive.

Men were taught to be chivalrous and gentlemanly. This brand of masculinity was created specifically to give men a role in society that excluded violence and aggression as a necessary component of the masculine role. Women were given responsibility for raising children, and the duty of motherhood has historically worked very well at motivating women to control their feminine vices. The Bible even teaches that basically motherhood redeems women and that the vast majority of women cannot resist their sinful nature until they embrace motherhood. It taught this for a reason and now that so many women are shunning or delaying motherhood we're seeing feminine vices running rampant in society and no one is willing to criticize them.

At the same time though, men are being told that they should embrace what is honestly a very negative and destructive brand of masculinity. A brand of masculinity that was never really about improving men's lives or "getting in touch with our true nature" as people will claim... Rather instead this modern notion of machismo was created primarily for women with bad boy fever.

When I see a guy who obsessively pushes men to embrace machismo... I see the biggest simps of all in our society. These are men who literally changed their entire personality in order to essentially serve as an entertainment jockey for women with toxic desires. The reason why women like bad boys is because of the feminine vice of needing chaos and drama. Bad boy types are basically a constant source of chaos and drama which is why they like them. But society today encourages women to basically embrace this vice which is just as toxic for civilization as telling men to embrace violence is.

Historically, women who were attracted to and had sex with bad boy types were harshly criticized as immoral. The reason why is because women's attraction to bad boy types keeps civilization in a primal, barbaric state. It rewards men for behaviors that are destructive to civilization when, as a society, we need to be rewarding the men who are displaying positive behaviors. We need to reward morality, creativity, and intelligence but when women have sex with bad boy types, this instead rewards violence, chaos, and stupidity. When men are rewarded for this, society eventually collapses and returns to a barbaric state of being.

And nothing disappoints me more then seeing so called "conservatives" who are advocating for the complete opposite of what their ancestors advocated for. None of our conservative ancestors thought embracing our primal, beastly natures was a good thing. There is nothing conservative about it, and if you promote that, you are just promoting old fashioned social liberalism... You're not promoting conservative values.
